function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conducting in-depth interviews with managers of service SMEs during the pandemic","Impact":"Risk of exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Use personal protective equipment and maintain physical distancing during interviews","Technologies":"Video conferencing, virtual meeting platforms","People":"Managers of service SMEs, researchers conducting interviews","Owner":"Researchers, managers of service SMEs"},{"Description":"Developing new services and transforming existing ones during Covid-19","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases during service transformation","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and safety measures during service transformation","Technologies":"Remote work tools, automation technology for contactless service provision","People":"Employees involved in service transformation","Owner":"Managers, business owners, health and safety professionals"},{"Description":"Utilizing co-creation and dynamic capabilities to foster agility in service SMEs","Impact":"Risk of close collaborative work leading to potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement remote collaboration tools and maintain strict health and safety protocols during collaborative work","Technologies":"Collaborative software, virtual project management tools","People":"Employees, co-creators, service SME managers","Owner":"Managers, business owners, health and safety professionals"}]}
